PackageOracle.name: DA_ASSOCIATE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ASSOCIATE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.39.227933000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_associate;

body.name: DA_ASSOCIATE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ASSOCIATE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.39.241078000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate.add(fx), parms=' || human_resources_num || '|' || hire_dt || '|' || termination_dt || '|' || contractor_ind || '|' || title_nm || '|' || ad_logon_id || '|' || avaya_logon_id || '|' || csg_logon_id || '|' || csg_operator_id || '|' || csg_group_id || '|' || current_job_start_dt || '|' || job_classification_cd || '|' || original_hire_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_associate a
(
a.associate_id
,a.human_resources_num
,a.hire_dt
,a.termination_dt
,a.contractor_ind
,a.title_nm
,a.ad_logon_id
,a.avaya_logon_id
,a.csg_logon_id
,a.csg_operator_id
,a.csg_group_id
,a.current_job_start_dt
,a.job_classification_cd
,a.original_hire_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_associate_id.NEXTVAL
,add.human_resources_num
,add.hire_dt
,add.termination_dt
,add.contractor_ind
,add.title_nm
,add.ad_logon_id
,add.avaya_logon_id
,add.csg_logon_id
,add.csg_operator_id
,add.csg_group_id
,add.current_job_start_dt
,add.job_classification_cd
,add.original_hire_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.associate_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate.add, parms=' || human_resources_num || '|' || hire_dt || '|' || termination_dt || '|' || contractor_ind || '|' || title_nm || '|' || ad_logon_id || '|' || avaya_logon_id || '|' || csg_logon_id || '|' || csg_operator_id || '|' || csg_group_id || '|' || current_job_start_dt || '|' || job_classification_cd || '|' || original_hire_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_associate a
(
a.associate_id
,a.human_resources_num
,a.hire_dt
,a.termination_dt
,a.contractor_ind
,a.title_nm
,a.ad_logon_id
,a.avaya_logon_id
,a.csg_logon_id
,a.csg_operator_id
,a.csg_group_id
,a.current_job_start_dt
,a.job_classification_cd
,a.original_hire_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_associate_id.NEXTVAL
,add.human_resources_num
,add.hire_dt
,add.termination_dt
,add.contractor_ind
,add.title_nm
,add.ad_logon_id
,add.avaya_logon_id
,add.csg_logon_id
,add.csg_operator_id
,add.csg_group_id
,add.current_job_start_dt
,add.job_classification_cd
,add.original_hire_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,human_resources_num IN VARCHAR2
,hire_dt IN DATE
,termination_dt IN DATE
,contractor_ind IN VARCHAR2
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,ad_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,avaya_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,csg_operator_id IN NUMBER
,csg_group_id IN NUMBER
,current_job_start_dt IN DATE
,job_classification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_hire_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate.add, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || human_resources_num || '|' || hire_dt || '|' || termination_dt || '|' || contractor_ind || '|' || title_nm || '|' || ad_logon_id || '|' || avaya_logon_id || '|' || csg_logon_id || '|' || csg_operator_id || '|' || csg_group_id || '|' || current_job_start_dt || '|' || job_classification_cd || '|' || original_hire_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_associate a
(
a.associate_id
,a.human_resources_num
,a.hire_dt
,a.termination_dt
,a.contractor_ind
,a.title_nm
,a.ad_logon_id
,a.avaya_logon_id
,a.csg_logon_id
,a.csg_operator_id
,a.csg_group_id
,a.current_job_start_dt
,a.job_classification_cd
,a.original_hire_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.associate_id
,add.human_resources_num
,add.hire_dt
,add.termination_dt
,add.contractor_ind
,add.title_nm
,add.ad_logon_id
,add.avaya_logon_id
,add.csg_logon_id
,add.csg_operator_id
,add.csg_group_id
,add.current_job_start_dt
,add.job_classification_cd
,add.original_hire_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate.del, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_associate a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.associate_id = del.associate_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate.del');

END del;

END da_associate;
